author: Sarah Swadley

review: Extremely limited wifi range. Bought the Fire Stick on sale for $25 before Christmas 2014. Seemed to work well initially, then we moved and its faults became obvious. While the interface and content are pretty nice, the Fire Stick only effectively works within 10 ft of our wifi router, which is unfortunate, because we purchased with the intent of this device working with our bedroom TV, and had it performed as we expected, we would have bought the Fire TV for our living room. Instead, we had to move the Fire Stick to our living room to be close enough to our router to be functional and move our smart DVD player to our bedroom. In addition to extremely weak wifi, the Fire Stick processor can also be overworked and requires almost a daily hard (unplugging) reboot. On the whole, while the content is good and when it works well it's great the Fire Stick is too unreliable for me to recommend. But the Fire TV or something else, the Fire Stick is unlikely to satisfy your needs.
